pageHeader.heading: Careers
pageHeader.text: We are always on the lookout for people with great talent and virtue to join Legatum and help drive it towards its vision of seeing a more prosperous world.

careersBlocks.heading: Get in touch
careersBlocks.text: To register your interest, please send us your CV along with a cover note. You may also be interested in reading more about our team or compensation philosophy.

aboutPages.title: People
aboutPages.metaDescription: We are a team of people bound together by a shared desire to make the world better for everyone.

aboutPages.title: Compensation philosophy
aboutPages.metaDescription: At Legatum, we believe that everyone is born with a gift. This gift has been given to help us achieve our purpose in life.
